unnormalised: New Delhi – The nationwide smart meter deployment is steadily progressing, with several states actively embracing the technology to improve energy efficiency and reduce transmission losses. As of today, 14/11/2024, over 5 million smart meters have been installed across various DISCOMs, according to data released by the Ministry of Power.

unnormalised: Maharashtra leads the way, followed by Uttar Pradesh and Bihar. The push for smart meters aligns with the Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme (RDSS), aiming for near 100% smart metering by March 31st, 2025.
